languages.text: [Обратиться к бойцам на арене] "Как вы могли пойти на это? Стать развлечением для врагов Человечества?"
[Address the fighters in the arena] "How could you stoop to this? To killing one another for the amusement of the enemies of Humanity?"
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к бойцам на арене] "Как вы могли пойти на это? Стать развлечением для врагов Человечества?"

traits.locale_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "How could you do this? Kill one another for the merriment of the enemies of Mankind?"

[Address the fighters in the arena] "How could you stoop to this? To killing one another for the amusement of the enemies of Humanity?"

languages.text: [闘技場の戦士に語りかける]「こんなことに従っているのか？人類の敵を楽しませるために同胞を殺すことに？」
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "How could you stoop to this? To killing one another for the amusement of the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: [闘技場の戦士に語りかける]「こんなことに従っているのか？人類の敵を楽しませるために同胞を殺すことに？」

languages.text: [对竞技场里的战士开口]“你们居然为了取悦人类之敌而互相残杀？你们怎么能堕落到这种地步？”
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "How could you stoop to this? To killing one another for the amusement of the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: [对竞技场里的战士开口]“你们居然为了取悦人类之敌而互相残杀？你们怎么能堕落到这种地步？”

languages.text: [Vous adresser aux combattants dans l'arène] « Comment avez-vous pu vous abaisser à de telles vilenies ? Pourquoi vous entretuer pour divertir les ennemis de l'humanité ? »
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "How could you stoop to this? To killing one another for the amusement of the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser aux combattants dans l'arène] « Comment avez-vous pu vous abaisser à de telles vilenies ? Pourquoi vous entretuer pour divertir les ennemis de l'humanité ? »

languages.text: [Dirigirte a los guerreros de la arena] «¿Cómo podéis rebajaros a esto? ¿A mataros entre vosotros para divertir a los enemigos de la Humanidad?».
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "How could you stoop to this? To killing one another for the amusement of the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a los guerreros de la arena] «¿Cómo podéis rebajaros a esto? A mataros entre vosotros para divertir a los enemigos de la Humanidad?».

languages.text: [Die Kämpfer in der Arena ansprechen] "Wie konntet Ihr so tief sinken? Jemand anderen zur Unterhaltung der Feinde der Menschheit zu töten?"
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "How could you stoop to this? To killing one another for the amusement of the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: [Die Kämpfer in der Arena ansprechen] "Wie könnt Ihr Euch dazu herablassen? Euch zur Belustigung der Feinde der Menschheit gegenseitig zu töten?"

languages.text: [Arenadaki dövüşçülere hitap et] "Nasıl böyle alçalabildiniz? İnsanlığın düşmanları eğlensin diye birbirinizi öldürüyorsunuz!"
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "How could you stoop to this? To killing one another for the amusement of the enemies of Humanity?"
